main event: An observer sighted a flying saucer-like object traveling from south to northwest at altitude between 300 to 500 feet over Bethany Beach, Delaware.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30 to 50 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted about 5 minutes and 8 seconds., It was seen moving fairly swiftly and could abruptly speed up or rush away., The object had a bright silver or white color and no visible means of propulsion., The observer reported a sudden disappearance of the object straight up out of sight.
